a: Default message - you'll see this only if the lambda hook failed
args:
{transcript}

Please review the above medical transcript and extract all the symptoms mentioned by the patient into a bulleted list. Present the symptoms in a clear, organized, and easy-to-read format with each symptom on a new line. If a symptom is mentioned multiple times, include it only once in the list. If there are any abbreviations or medical jargon that may be unclear to a layperson, please spell out the full term. In case of any ambiguity or if you need additional context to accurately identify the symptoms, feel free to ask for clarification.Example output: - Patient report headache with nausea during the conversation- Difficulty of breathing was also highlighted with chest pain (angina)
